languages.text: "Почему я? Обратитесь к Инквизиции, если это так важно".
"Why me specifically? If this is so important, you should ask the Inquisition."
languages.original_text: "Почему я? Обратитесь к Инквизиции, если это так важно".

traits.locale_text: "Why me specifically? If this is so important, you should ask the Inquisition."
"Why me specifically? If this is so important, you should ask the Inquisition."
"Why me specifically? If this is so important, you should ask the Inquisition."
"Why me specifically? If this is so important, you should ask the Inquisition."
"Why me specifically? If this is so important, you should ask the Inquisition."
"Why me specifically? If this is so important, you should ask the Inquisition."

languages.text: 「なぜ{mf|俺|私}に？それほど重要なことなら、異端審問庁に頼むべきだろう」
languages.original_text: "Why me specifically? If this is so important, you should ask the Inquisition."

traits.locale_text: 「なぜ{mf|俺|私}に？それほど重要なことなら、異端審問庁に頼むべきだろう」

languages.text: "Warum gerade ich? Wenn es so wichtig ist, solltet Ihr mit der Inquisition sprechen."
languages.original_text: "Why me specifically? If this is so important, you should ask the Inquisition."

traits.locale_text: "Warum gerade ich? Wenn es so wichtig ist, solltet Ihr mit der Inquisition sprechen."

languages.text: « Pourquoi moi ? Si c'est aussi important que vous le laissez entendre, vous feriez mieux de vous adresser à l'Inquisition. »
languages.original_text: "Why me specifically? If this is so important, you should ask the Inquisition."

traits.locale_text: « Pourquoi moi ? Si c'est aussi important que vous le laissez entendre, vous feriez mieux de vous adresser à l'Inquisition. »

languages.text: «¿Por qué yo concretamente? Si esto es tan importante, deberían pedírselo a la Inquisición».
languages.original_text: "Why me specifically? If this is so important, you should ask the Inquisition."

traits.locale_text: «¿Por qué yo concretamente? Si esto es tan importante, deberían pedírselo a la Inquisición».

languages.text: “为什么要找我？既然这件事情这么重要，那你应该去找审判庭才对。”
languages.original_text: "Why me specifically? If this is so important, you should ask the Inquisition."

traits.locale_text: “为什么要找我？既然这件事情这么重要，那你应该去找审判庭才对。”

languages.text: "Neden özellikle ben? Bu kadar önemliyse Engizisyon'a sorulmalı."
languages.original_text: "Why me specifically? If this is so important, you should ask the Inquisition."

traits.locale_text: "Neden özellikle ben? Bu kadar önemliyse Engizisyon'a sorulmalı."
